alert.note: Alert for Pennington (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 8:14PM CDT until May 03 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Red Lake River at Highlanding near Goodridge affecting Pennington County. .Water levels continue to rise slowly and are expected to crest at or just shy of Minor Flood Stage. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red Lake River at Highlanding near Goodridge. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. Some county roads are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 12.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
